12th century.
In the 12th century
A three holed-flute made from a mammoth tusk and two flutes made from swan's bones.
A three-holed flute made from a mammoth tusk and two flutes made from swans' bones are among the oldest known musical instruments
7th century BC.
After the 7th century BC
A Bernoulli, or siphon.
